name: Cryptic Tale
description:
Created by: Backinmydaygames.com

Description: 

Cryptic Tale is the first installment in an odd rpg series. Created by one developer and only 3 levels long. The game follows our hero buster babs in a fictional post COVID19 world. I hope you enjoy Cryptic Tale and show your support so I can make better and larger games. Cryptic tale 2 will be set in Color Kingdom and a jrpg that is already in the works. Also check out backinmydaygames.com to follow my blog and play other creations such as Get to the Super Boss.

Game Instructions:

Movement: Arrow Keys
Attack: Press A

Level 2 Motorcycle Level

Movement: Arrow Keys (UP & DOWN)
